course_description: The objective of this course is to fully engage students in a variety of co-curricular events that will enhance personal and professional development.  In addition to programming provided by the school, and opportunities to learn from outside professionals, some events organized by student organizations will also count towards junior seminar credit.   Programming will be provided in career management, business research, leadership, technology, and academic skills & professional development.  Finally, attendance at speaker events will generally count towards the session requirement.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: 1708, Section #: 1101, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: A. Hershatter, Status: Open
